description: This module aims to emphasize the importance of Communication in ensuring that gender DEI initiatives are understood, valued, and embraced by the workforce. It also explores how Analytics can be used to measure and assess the impact of these initiatives.

subcategories.name: Caselet 2 | Creative Horizon and the Struggle to Transform DEI Culture | 15-20 Min
Caselet 3 | The Future of Inclusion: Integrating Analytics into DEI Efforts | 15-20 Min
Video | Microaggressions in the Workplace | 10 Min
